nodes.docs: Watches for TIP20 token approval events.
tags: A function to unsubscribe from the event.

nodes.docs: Address or ID of the TIP20 token.
Callback to invoke when tokens are approved.

virtualFiles.content:
// @filename: viem.config.ts
import { createClient, http, publicActions, walletActions } from 'viem'
import { privateKeyToAccount } from 'viem/accounts'
import { tempoModerato } from 'viem/chains'
import { tempoActions } from 'viem/tempo'

export const client = createClient({
  account: privateKeyToAccount('0x...'),
  chain: tempoModerato,
  transport: http(),
})
  .extend(publicActions)
  .extend(walletActions)
  .extend(tempoActions())

hovers.docs: Watches for TIP20 token approval events.
tags: A function to unsubscribe from the event.

hovers.docs: Address or ID of the TIP20 token.
Callback to invoke when tokens are approved.
